Glorpy is a… well a… a thing in space! At least that is all the earthlings know about it. Glorpy is not amused by their ignorance. The earthlings keep trying to land on Glorpy\'s planet and Glorpy wants them gone. Glorpy knows what they want. The earthlings are looking for another planet to destroy for resources. Take the role Glorpy and defend your home from the alien earthling invaders! The harder you fight, the more earthlings attack so survive as long as you can so your people can prepare the defense!
Above is a picture of the controller that will be built into the phone screen. Use the arrow buttons to move Glorpy and use the fire ball picture button to shoot!

Move Glorpy to dodge lasers, missiles, and kamikazes. Fire back with Glorpy\'s fireballs. Eat astronauts for health and watch for cargo boxes for earn evolution points! Upgrade Glorpy using your hard earned evolution points. How high can you get your score before going down?

Make Glorpy stronger by spending your evolution points! There are 3 categories. Power, Speed, and Life. 
 
 Power: Upgrades Glorpy's fireball damage, durability, and reduces time between firing. 
 
 Speed: Upgrades Glorpy's movement speed and fireball speed. 
 
 Life: Upgrades Glorpy's max life and reduces damage taken.
Get Rewards! It will only take a few seconds. Watch a short reward ad and instantly revive 5 evolution points to upgrade Glorpy! You may receive rewards once every 30 minutes.
